claim.text: The application of generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) in financial analysis and investment decision-making has gained significant attention.
claim.exact_quote: The application of generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) in financial analysis and investment decision-making has gained significant attention.

claim.text: Most existing approaches rely on single-agent systems, which fail to fully utilize the collaborative potential of multiple AI agents.
claim.exact_quote: Most existing approaches rely on single-agent systems, which fail to fully utilize the collaborative potential of multiple AI agents.

claim.text: We propose a novel multi-agent collaboration system designed to enhance decision-making in financial investment research.
claim.exact_quote: We propose a novel multi-agent collaboration system designed to enhance decision-making in financial investment research.

claim.text: The system incorporates agent groups with both configurable group sizes and collaboration structures to leverage the strengths of each agent group type.
claim.exact_quote: The system incorporates agent groups with both configurable group sizes and collaboration structures to leverage the strengths of each agent group type.

claim.text: By utilizing a sub-optimal combination strategy, the system dynamically adapts to varying market conditions and investment scenarios, optimizing performance across different tasks.
claim.exact_quote: By utilizing a sub-optimal combination strategy, the system dynamically adapts to varying market conditions and investment scenarios, optimizing performance across different tasks.

claim.text: We focus on three sub-tasks: fundamentals, market sentiment, and risk analysis, by analyzing the 2023 SEC 10-K forms of 30 companies listed on the Dow Jones Index.
claim.exact_quote: We focus on three sub-tasks: fundamentals, market sentiment, and risk analysis, by analyzing the 2023 SEC 10-K forms of 30 companies listed on the Dow Jones Index.

claim.text: Our findings reveal significant performance variations based on the configurations of AI agents for different tasks.
claim.exact_quote: Our findings reveal significant performance variations based on the configurations of AI agents for different tasks.

claim.text: The results demonstrate that our multi-agent collaboration system outperforms traditional single-agent models, offering improved accuracy, efficiency, and adaptability in complex financial environments.
claim.exact_quote: The results demonstrate that our multi-agent collaboration system outperforms traditional single-agent models, offering improved accuracy, efficiency, and adaptability in complex financial environments.

claim.text: This study highlights the potential of multi-agent systems in transforming financial analysis and investment decision-making by integrating diverse analytical perspectives.
claim.exact_quote: This study highlights the potential of multi-agent systems in transforming financial analysis and investment decision-making by integrating diverse analytical perspectives.

claim.text: We defined several novel AI agent architectures from single-agent to multi-agent, and explored vertical/horizontal/hybrid multi-agent collaboration structures distinguished between internal implementations of leadership and cooperation.
claim.exact_quote: We defined several novel AI agent architectures from single-agent to multi-agent, and explored vertical/horizontal/hybrid multi-agent collaboration structures distinguished between internal implementations of leadership and cooperation.

claim.text: We performed an in-depth analysis of the forms of information flow between agents in tasks of varying difficulty, explaining the core differences produced by different collaboration architectures.
claim.exact_quote: We performed an in-depth analysis of the forms of information flow between agents in tasks of varying difficulty, explaining the core differences produced by different collaboration architectures.

claim.text: Based on our experimental results, we identified the optimal multi-agent architectures for various sub-tasks. We demonstrated that an ensemble structure involving multiple agent groups achieves superior performance in investment research tasks, achieving target price prediction with 2.35% avg. diff. and 66.7% accuracy in buy or not decision-making, surpassing all other agent architectures.
claim.exact_quote: Based on our experimental results, we identified the optimal multi-agent architectures for various sub-tasks. We demonstrated that an ensemble structure involving multiple agent groups achieves superior performance in investment research tasks, achieving target price prediction with 2.35% avg. diff. and 66.7% accuracy in buy or not decision-making, surpassing all other agent architectures.

claim.text: In this study, we analyze the annual reports of listed companies through three primary tasks: company fundamentals analysis, market sentiment analysis, and risk analysis.
claim.exact_quote: In this study, we analyze the annual reports of listed companies through three primary tasks: company fundamentals analysis, market sentiment analysis, and risk analysis.

claim.text: Each task follows a unified introduction and scoring system to ensure consistency.
claim.exact_quote: Each task follows a unified introduction and scoring system to ensure consistency.

claim.text: Company Fundamentals Analysis focuses on evaluating a company’s financial health, operational efficiency, profitability, and cash flow status.
claim.exact_quote: Company Fundamentals Analysis focuses on evaluating a company’s financial health, operational efficiency, profitability, and cash flow status.

claim.text: Market Sentiment Analysis gathers information from diverse sources such as news, social media, and investor reports to assess sentiment changes, which are closely linked to market trends and investment opportunities.
claim.exact_quote: Market Sentiment Analysis gathers information from diverse sources such as news, social media, and investor reports to assess sentiment changes, which are closely linked to market trends and investment opportunities.

claim.text: Risk Analysis involves identifying investment risk factors based on financial data.
claim.exact_quote: Risk Analysis involves identifying investment risk factors based on financial data.

claim.text: The complexity and depth of the tasks increase from fundamental analysis to sentiment analysis and risk analysis.
claim.exact_quote: The complexity and depth of the tasks increase from fundamental analysis to sentiment analysis and risk analysis.

claim.text: In fundamental analysis, standard metrics such as financial health, operational efficiency, profitability, and cash flow status are used.
claim.exact_quote: In fundamental analysis, standard metrics such as financial health, operational efficiency, profitability, and cash flow status are used.

claim.text: Single agents, equipped with the necessary tools to calculate these metrics, can complete the task efficiently and produce high-quality reports.
claim.exact_quote: Single agents, equipped with the necessary tools to calculate these metrics, can complete the task efficiently and produce high-quality reports.

claim.text: In contrast, larger agent groups introduce noise through debates and differing opinions, reducing the readability and coherence of the final reports.
claim.exact_quote: In contrast, larger agent groups introduce noise through debates and differing opinions, reducing the readability and coherence of the final reports.

claim.text: Sentiment analysis based on social media presents a relatively complex task.
claim.exact_quote: Sentiment analysis based on social media presents a relatively complex task.

claim.text: Multiple sentiment tendencies can coexist in the market, and the content, particularly from individual forums, may be contradictory.
claim.exact_quote: Multiple sentiment tendencies can coexist in the market, and the content, particularly from individual forums, may be contradictory.

claim.text: Agents must analyze substantial information to provide a comprehensive sentiment analysis.
claim.exact_quote: Agents must analyze substantial information to provide a comprehensive sentiment analysis.

claim.text: Risk analysis is highly challenging, requiring agents to identify potential risks in annual reports, online news, and social media.
claim.exact_quote: Risk analysis is highly challenging, requiring agents to identify potential risks in annual reports, online news, and social media.

claim.text: Collaborative efforts and debates among agents enhance insights and accuracy, resulting in more comprehensive risk reports.
claim.exact_quote: Collaborative efforts and debates among agents enhance insights and accuracy, resulting in more comprehensive risk reports.

claim.text: Larger agent groups can leverage diverse perspectives and expertise, leading to more thorough identification and analysis of risks.
claim.exact_quote: Larger agent groups can leverage diverse perspectives and expertise, leading to more thorough identification and analysis of risks.

claim.text: The collaborative process improves the overall quality of the report, making it more readable and coherent.
claim.exact_quote: The collaborative process improves the overall quality of the report, making it more readable and coherent.

claim.text: The success of larger agent groups in risk analysis emphasizes the value of diversity in thought and expertise when dealing with intricate and dynamic information.
claim.exact_quote: The success of larger agent groups in risk analysis emphasizes the value of diversity in thought and expertise when dealing with intricate and dynamic information.

claim.text: The ability to pool knowledge and cross-verify findings helps mitigate individual biases and leads to more robust and reliable conclusions.
claim.exact_quote: The ability to pool knowledge and cross-verify findings helps mitigate individual biases and leads to more robust and reliable conclusions.

claim.text: This collaborative approach is particularly beneficial in scenarios where the stakes are high, and the accuracy of the analysis is crucial for informed decision-making.
claim.exact_quote: This collaborative approach is particularly beneficial in scenarios where the stakes are high, and the accuracy of the analysis is crucial for informed decision-making.

claim.text: We conduct the same generated content quality evaluation based on different agent collaboration structures.
claim.exact_quote: We conduct the same generated content quality evaluation based on different agent collaboration structures.

claim.text: The overall trend in Table 3 indicates that for easier tasks, such as fundamental and sentiment analysis, hybrid and horizontal structures perform better.
claim.exact_quote: The overall trend in Table 3 indicates that for easier tasks, such as fundamental and sentiment analysis, hybrid and horizontal structures perform better.

claim.text: For more complex tasks, like risk analysis, the vertical structure yields superior performance.
claim.exact_quote: For more complex tasks, like risk analysis, the vertical structure yields superior performance.

claim.text: We carefully analyzed the execution and communication records of agents of all structures in various tasks, and drew the information flow between agents in these structures shown in Figure 4.
claim.exact_quote: We carefully analyzed the execution and communication records of agents of all structures in various tasks, and drew the information flow between agents in these structures shown in Figure 4.

claim.text: Among the three sub-tasks, both fundamental analysis and sentiment analysis have clear and relatively simple task objectives and execution processes.
claim.exact_quote: Among the three sub-tasks, both fundamental analysis and sentiment analysis have clear and relatively simple task objectives and execution processes.

claim.text: For example, fundamental analysis mainly involves extracting key fundamental analysis indicators from annual reports, which are common indicators used in financial investment.
claim.exact_quote: For example, fundamental analysis mainly involves extracting key fundamental analysis indicators from annual reports, which are common indicators used in financial investment.

claim.text: Sentiment analysis first crawls data from multiple media data sources, and then further summarizes the sentiment in the text.
claim.exact_quote: Sentiment analysis first crawls data from multiple media data sources, and then further summarizes the sentiment in the text.

claim.text: It can be summarized that these two tasks mainly involve the collection, organization and summary of key information, and ensure the comprehensiveness and reliability of information.
claim.exact_quote: It can be summarized that these two tasks mainly involve the collection, organization and summary of key information, and ensure the comprehensiveness and reliability of information.

claim.text: For such relatively basic tasks, when multiple agents can communicate, multiple agents can share their own information, and the information provide by these agents can be used to correct errors and complement each other to improve the comprehensiveness and reliability.
claim.exact_quote: For such relatively basic tasks, when multiple agents can communicate, multiple agents can share their own information, and the information provide by these agents can be used to correct errors and complement each other to improve the comprehensiveness and reliability.

claim.text: The final decision-making power of the leader is not very useful for such information-collecting-and-summarizing and non-decision-making tasks.
claim.exact_quote: The final decision-making power of the leader is not very useful for such information-collecting-and-summarizing and non-decision-making tasks.

claim.text: Therefore, we can observe that the horizontal structure and the hybrid structure perform better in these two tasks because they allow communication and collaboration between agents.
claim.exact_quote: Therefore, we can observe that the horizontal structure and the hybrid structure perform better in these two tasks because they allow communication and collaboration between agents.

claim.text: Unlike these two tasks, risk analysis is more inclined to an analysis task and a decision-making task.
claim.exact_quote: Unlike these two tasks, risk analysis is more inclined to an analysis task and a decision-making task.

claim.text: It not only requires the abovementioned collection of various types of information, but more importantly, it requires in-depth analysis of various information and judges potential investment risks based on the existing knowledge of the agent, which requires the agent to have analysis and judgment capabilities.
claim.exact_quote: It not only requires the abovementioned collection of various types of information, but more importantly, it requires in-depth analysis of various information and judges potential investment risks based on the existing knowledge of the agent, which requires the agent to have analysis and judgment capabilities.

claim.text: Risk evaluation is often implicit, and different agents may have differing opinions.
claim.exact_quote: Risk evaluation is often implicit, and different agents may have differing opinions.

claim.text: For this task, we need a core leader to synthesize the analysis results of other analysts and make the final risk judgment.
claim.exact_quote: For this task, we need a core leader to synthesize the analysis results of other analysts and make the final risk judgment.

claim.text: It is very important for different analysts to provide valuable insights from their own perspectives.
claim.exact_quote: It is very important for different analysts to provide valuable insights from their own perspectives.

claim.text: If analysts can communicate with each other, it may lead to convergence of opinions among analysts, making the information available to decision makers biased.
claim.exact_quote: If analysts can communicate with each other, it may lead to convergence of opinions among analysts, making the information available to decision makers biased.

claim.text: The vertical structure, through centralized control, ensures efficiency and consistency in information processing.
claim.exact_quote: The vertical structure, through centralized control, ensures efficiency and consistency in information processing.

claim.text: The leading agent evaluates and filters information collected from subordinate agents, focusing on the most critical data.
claim.exact_quote: The leading agent evaluates and filters information collected from subordinate agents, focusing on the most critical data.

claim.text: The leader’s role in synthesizing diverse viewpoints helps maintain coherence and focus in the final report.
claim.exact_quote: The leader’s role in synthesizing diverse viewpoints helps maintain coherence and focus in the final report.

claim.text: The horizontal structure, where all agents are on the same level and freely communicate, may lead to unresolved disagreements and introduce noise into the final report.
claim.exact_quote: The horizontal structure, where all agents are on the same level and freely communicate, may lead to unresolved disagreements and introduce noise into the final report.

claim.text: In the hybrid structure, although there is a leader, the communication between the two agents can complicate the leader’s decision-making process, potentially affecting the quality of the final report.
claim.exact_quote: In the hybrid structure, although there is a leader, the communication between the two agents can complicate the leader’s decision-making process, potentially affecting the quality of the final report.

claim.text: Therefore, for this kind of task, we found that the vertical structure performs better.
claim.exact_quote: Therefore, for this kind of task, we found that the vertical structure performs better.

claim.text: The choice of collaboration structure significantly impacts the quality of generated content.
claim.exact_quote: The choice of collaboration structure significantly impacts the quality of generated content.

claim.text: For fundamental and sentiment analysis, hybrid and horizontal structures are beneficial due to their support for open dialogue and diverse perspectives.
claim.exact_quote: For fundamental and sentiment analysis, hybrid and horizontal structures are beneficial due to their support for open dialogue and diverse perspectives.

claim.text: For risk analysis, a vertical structure with a decisive leader is advantageous.
claim.exact_quote: For risk analysis, a vertical structure with a decisive leader is advantageous.

claim.text: The leader’s ability to integrate different viewpoints and make final decisions facilitates supervision and control, ensuring the coherence and readability of the report.
claim.exact_quote: The leader’s ability to integrate different viewpoints and make final decisions facilitates supervision and control, ensuring the coherence and readability of the report.

claim.text: This underscores the importance of selecting an appropriate collaboration structure based on the nature and complexity of the task to optimize the quality of the generated content.
claim.exact_quote: This underscores the importance of selecting an appropriate collaboration structure based on the nature and complexity of the task to optimize the quality of the generated content.

claim.text: Lastly, we perform a financial decision analysis by integrating three key sub-tasks.
claim.exact_quote: Lastly, we perform a financial decision analysis by integrating three key sub-tasks.

claim.text: This integration aims to provide a comprehensive evaluation of our system’s performance.
claim.exact_quote: This integration aims to provide a comprehensive evaluation of our system’s performance.

claim.text: We leverage GPT-4 to predict stock prices for the upcoming week with the information provided by three sub-tasks and provide investment recommendations.
claim.exact_quote: We leverage GPT-4 to predict stock prices for the upcoming week with the information provided by three sub-tasks and provide investment recommendations.

claim.text: On the one hand, we utilize the same structure-generated content to generate final decision.
claim.exact_quote: On the one hand, we utilize the same structure-generated content to generate final decision.

claim.text: On the other hand, our sub-task analysis reveal that vertical agent structure excels in risk analysis, while single agent structure performs better in fundamental and market sentiment tasks.
claim.exact_quote: On the other hand, our sub-task analysis reveal that vertical agent structure excels in risk analysis, while single agent structure performs better in fundamental and market sentiment tasks.

claim.text: Consequently, we select the optimal structure for each subtask, resulting in a “ensemble structure.”
claim.exact_quote: Consequently, we select the optimal structure for each subtask, resulting in a “ensemble structure.”

claim.text: First, we evaluate the error between the target price predicted by GPT-4 for the upcoming week and the actual price.
claim.exact_quote: First, we evaluate the error between the target price predicted by GPT-4 for the upcoming week and the actual price.

claim.text: The error is defined as the absolute difference between the predicted and actual price, divided by the actual price.
claim.exact_quote: The error is defined as the absolute difference between the predicted and actual price, divided by the actual price.

claim.text: Despite the smallest target price difference is observed in dual agent structures, the ensemble agent structure outperforms other structures in price prediction accuracy.
claim.exact_quote: Despite the smallest target price difference is observed in dual agent structures, the ensemble agent structure outperforms other structures in price prediction accuracy.

claim.text: Then, we focus on the core evaluation metric of for intelligent investment research: the accuracy of AI agents in making investment decisions, specifically determining whether to buy or not based on predicted stock price movements.
claim.exact_quote: Then, we focus on the core evaluation metric of for intelligent investment research: the accuracy of AI agents in making investment decisions, specifically determining whether to buy or not based on predicted stock price movements.

claim.text: In our experiment involving 30 stocks, the ensemble structure successfully predicted the movements of 20 stocks, achieving a prediction accuracy of 66.7%, whereas the full vertical agent structure only achieved 50%.
claim.exact_quote: In our experiment involving 30 stocks, the ensemble structure successfully predicted the movements of 20 stocks, achieving a prediction accuracy of 66.7%, whereas the full vertical agent structure only achieved 50%.

claim.text: This demonstrates that different agent structure designs significantly impact the performance of intelligent investment research.
claim.exact_quote: This demonstrates that different agent structure designs significantly impact the performance of intelligent investment research.

claim.text: Our findings suggest that agents with ensemble structures are more suitable for this practical application.
claim.exact_quote: Our findings suggest that agents with ensemble structures are more suitable for this practical application.

claim.text: This also highlights the importance of designing multi-agent structures tailored to the specific sub-tasks involved in financial decision-making.
claim.exact_quote: This also highlights the importance of designing multi-agent structures tailored to the specific sub-tasks involved in financial decision-making.

claim.text: This paper investigates the impact of AI agent structures on financial document analysis tasks.
claim.exact_quote: This paper investigates the impact of AI agent structures on financial document analysis tasks.

claim.text: We designed AI agents of varying sizes: single, dual, and triple.
claim.exact_quote: We designed AI agents of varying sizes: single, dual, and triple.

claim.text: Additionally, we implemented different collaborative structures among multiple AI agents, namely horizontal, vertical, and hybrid configurations.
claim.exact_quote: Additionally, we implemented different collaborative structures among multiple AI agents, namely horizontal, vertical, and hybrid configurations.

claim.text: Our experiments, conducted on the 10-K forms of 30 companies listed on the Dow Jones Index, reveal the heterogeneous performance of different AI agent structures across various tasks.
claim.exact_quote: Our experiments, conducted on the 10-K forms of 30 companies listed on the Dow Jones Index, reveal the heterogeneous performance of different AI agent structures across various tasks.

claim.text: The results highlight the importance of suitable AI agent structure selection in emphasizing financial documents.
claim.exact_quote: The results highlight the importance of suitable AI agent structure selection in emphasizing financial documents.

claim.text: Overall, our findings provide valuable insights into the optimization of AI agent structures for financial document analysis, offering practical guidelines for enhancing performance through strategic design and collaboration.
claim.exact_quote: Overall, our findings provide valuable insights into the optimization of AI agent structures for financial document analysis, offering practical guidelines for enhancing performance through strategic design and collaboration.

claim.text: This work is one step toward financial document analysis for financial tasks leveraging AI agents.
claim.exact_quote: This work is one step toward financial document analysis for financial tasks leveraging AI agents.

claim.text: Future research in this area may include: ensuring the continuous and complete flow of information in an extensively hierarchical multi-agent system; leveraging small-scale debates in group structure to enhance task performance; replacing the sub-optimal structure selection/combination strategy with a globally optimized task approach.
claim.exact_quote: Future research in this area may include: ensuring the continuous and complete flow of information in an extensively hierarchical multi-agent system; leveraging small-scale debates in group structure to enhance task performance; replacing the sub-optimal structure selection/combination strategy with a globally optimized task approach.
